description: Poetry helps you declare, manage and install dependencies of Python projects, ensuring you have the right stack everywhere.

options.description: Display help for the given command. When no command is given display help for the list command.
Do not ask any interactive question.
Specify another path as the project root.
The working directory for the Poetry command.
Increase the verbosity of messages: 1 for normal output, 2 for more verbose output and 3 for debug.

subcommands.name: add
subcommands.description: Adds dependency to pyproject.toml and installs it.

subcommands.name: build
subcommands.description: Builds a package, as a wheel and a source distribution.

subcommands.name: check
subcommands.description: Checks the validity of the pyproject.toml file.

subcommands.name: export
subcommands.description: Exports the lock file to alternative formats.

subcommands.name: init
subcommands.description: Creates a basic pyproject.toml file in current directory.

subcommands.name: new
subcommands.description: Creates a new Python project at <path>.

subcommands.name: publish
subcommands.description: Publishes a package to a remote repository.

subcommands.name: remove
subcommands.description: Removes a package from the project dependencies.

subcommands.name: run
subcommands.description: Runs a command in the project's virtual environment.

subcommands.name: search
subcommands.description: Searches for packages on remote repositories.

subcommands.name: shell
subcommands.description: Spawns a shell within the project's virtual environment.

subcommands.name: update
subcommands.description: Updates the project dependencies to the latest versions.

subcommands.name: version
subcommands.description: Shows the version of the project or bumps it when a valid bump rule is provided.
